title: font ID fairlane
content:
Hi,

I'm looking for something like this/along these lines. Sort-of halfway between a script and Magneto. Especially intersted in the "f":

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140502065320im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fairlane_logo_4527.gif)

Thank you...
author: Marco

comments.content:
Try [www.sudtipos.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20140502065320/http:/www.sudtipos.com/ "www.sudtipos.com") or [www.letterheadfonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20140502065320/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/ "www.letterheadfonts.com") for some good scripts. You're bound to find something close.

JH
